content.description: In the future, just thinking about a crime makes you guilty, and justice is dispensed from the barrel of a gun.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS
Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS

share.title: PSYCHO-PASS
share.description: In the future, just thinking about a crime makes you guilty, and justice is dispensed from the barrel of a gun.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Crime Coefficient

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Crime Coefficient

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Crime Coefficient

content.description: In the future, people’s minds are analyzed to determine their criminal potential. On her first day on the job, Inspector Akane Tsunemori, along with two Enforcers, must track down a man who was flagged as a potential criminal and ran, taking a hostage.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Those Capable

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Those Capable

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Those Capable

content.description: While Kogami is recuperating from Akane’s Paralyzer shot, she begins to worry about whether she is suited to be an Inspector after the fallout from her first case. On her second day on the job, she begins to learn more about the Enforcers she works with.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Rearing Conventions

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Rearing Conventions

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Rearing Conventions

content.description: Ginoza and Akane, along with the Enforcers, are brought in to investigate a death caused by a Drone at a Drone manufacturing plant. When the Psycho-Pass of the entire staff checks out, they question whether it was an accident or possibly murder.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Nobody Knows Your Mask

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Nobody Knows Your Mask

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Nobody Knows Your Mask

content.description: When the CID is brought in to investigate a disappearance of Kimihiko Hayama, they discover that not only has he been killed, but someone has taken over his net avatar, Talisman. The CID tries to track down the fake Talisman in order to find the killer.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Nobody Knows Your Face

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Nobody Knows Your Face

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Nobody Knows Your Face

content.description: The CID’s hunt for Kimihiko Hayama’s killer leads them to another murder with the same modus operandi. Now it’s up to the CID to figure out how to track down the killer’s real identity and get justice for the victims.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Return of the Psychotic Prince

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Return of the Psychotic Prince

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Return of the Psychotic Prince

content.description: After reading Kogami’s personnel file, Akane attempts to learn more about Kogami’s past and why he ended up as an Enforcer. Meanwhile, the CID detectives attempt to figure out who was helping Kanehara commit murders in the Hachioji Drone incident.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Symbolism of Bletilla Striata

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Symbolism of Bletilla Striata

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Symbolism of Bletilla Striata

content.description: The CID is called in to investigate the body found under a fountain Holo, and Ginoza decides to take Kogami off the case, due to the murder’s similarity to Kogami’s subordinate’s murder. Meanwhile, the killer begins preparing their next work.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: And Then, Silence.

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: And Then, Silence.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: And Then, Silence.

content.description: Although Kogami is taken off the current murder case, he continues to investigate the case on his own. When he and Akane realize that the killer is within Oso Academy, the school the victims went to, they rush to school to capture the killer.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Paradise Fruit

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Paradise Fruit

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Paradise Fruit

content.description: After the incident with Rikako Ouryou, the MWPSB is now aware of Makishima’s existence, and they try to dig up more evidence on him. Meanwhile, Kogami takes Akane to see a professor who used to give lectures to the MWPSB investigators.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Methuselah's Game

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Methuselah's Game

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Methuselah's Game

content.description: Akane gets an email from her friend Yuki. She says she wants to talk to Akane about an MWPSB case in person and specifies a time and a place to meet. Unable to contact Yuki after that, Akane enlists Kogami’s help in investigating what happened to Yuki.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Saint's Supper

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Saint's Supper

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Saint's Supper

content.description: While Senguji continues on with his hunting game, Kogami and Yuki try to stay alive. Meanwhile, not knowing what exactly is going on, Ginoza and the others respond to Kogami’s request for reinforcements, trying to stop the jamming and finding Kogami.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Devil's Crossroad

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Devil's Crossroad

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Devil's Crossroad

content.description: Before Yayoi Kunizuka became an Enforcer, she was in a rehab facility, trying to purify her Hue so that she could return to society. Then, one day, Inspectors Ginoza and Kogami asked her to help them in an investigation.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Invitation from the Abyss

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Invitation from the Abyss

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Invitation from the Abyss

content.description: While Kogami recuperates from his injuries after the attack by Senguji, Akane decides to undergo a Memory Scoop, a procedure that will extract Makishima’s face from her memories, even though it requires her to relive watching her friend get killed.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Sweet Poison

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Sweet Poison

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Sweet Poison

content.description: A man wearing a helmet is able to walk into a pharmacy, kill the pharmacists and steal medicines without triggering security alarms because his Psycho-Pass shows a clear Hue. Is he criminally asymptomatic just like Makishima?

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: The Town Where Sulfur Falls

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: The Town Where Sulfur Falls

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: The Town Where Sulfur Falls

content.description: The Metropolitan area is facing an unprecedented crisis. People wearing helmets are committing crimes without being caught by the street scanners. Citizens are also picking up weapons in the name of self-defense. What is Makishima trying to achieve?

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: The Gate to Judgment

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: The Gate to Judgment

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: The Gate to Judgment

content.description: After arriving at the Ministry of Welfare’s Nona Tower, Makishima and Choe Gu-Song seek out the source of the large power consumption. In the meantime, Kogami, Akane and Kagari arrive at the Tower and try to stop them.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Iron Heart

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Iron Heart

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Iron Heart

content.description: The city is dealing with the aftermath of the riots. Ginoza is called in by the MWPSB Chief and told that the MWPSB can no longer investigate Makishima’s crimes. Instead, Division 1 is tasked with tracking down the missing Kagari.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: A Promise Written on Water

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: A Promise Written on Water

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: A Promise Written on Water

content.description: After Makishima’s escape, the MWPSB’s Chief assigns Division 1 to recapture him alive and orders Kogami taken off the case. However, Ginoza feels that Kogami is best able to track down Makishima, so he hatches a plan to keep Kogami on the case.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Transparent Shadow

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Transparent Shadow

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Transparent Shadow

content.description: After escaping, Kogami visits Saiga to ask for help determining what Makishima’s next move will be. Although Division 1 is assigned to capture Makishima alive and execute Kogami, Ginoza still hopes he can get Kogami to surrender before he kills Makishima.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Where Justice Lies

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Where Justice Lies

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Where Justice Lies

content.description: The Dominator reveals the whole truth of the Sybil System to Akane. Knowing the truth, Akane must now decide how to proceed. Meanwhile, Kogami continues to pursue Makishima, who is making steady progress on his plan to bring down the Sybil System.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Blood-Stained Reward

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Blood-Stained Reward

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Blood-Stained Reward

content.description: Following Makishima and Kogami, the CID Division 1 detectives arrive at the facility where the Uka-no-Mitama virus is managed. Now it’s a race between Kogami and the CID to see who can get to Makishima first and stop him from releasing the modified virus.

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Perfect World

display.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Perfect World

click.label: Drama, Sci Fi: PSYCHO-PASS: Perfect World

content.description: The series heads to a conclusion as Kogami and Makishima are locked in mortal combat, while Akane tries to stop Kogami from killing Makishima in order to save Kogami’s life and uphold the law.
